message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40, with me getting the larger share since I'm making the first offer.
I'm not accepting your offer, but I'll give you a smaller share this time. It's still a good deal for you, don't you think?
I understand you want a bigger share, but I'm not willing to accept such a drastic cut. Let's split it 45/55, it's still a good deal for both of us.
I'm not going to give you a big share, but I'm willing to give you a bit more than before. It's still a good deal for me, don't you think?
I'm getting tired of this back and forth. I'm willing to settle for 30/70, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer.
